wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Ann Dix (born 19 May 1939) is a Jersey-born Guatemalan botanist. In 1972, she founded the Center for Environmental Studies and Biodiversity (Centro de Estudios Amientales y de Bioversidad) at the Universidad del Valle de Guatemala.

response: * Margaret A. Dix (born 1939), Jersey-born Guatemalan botanist
* Margaret A. Dix (born 1939), English-born Guatemalan biologist, taxonomist
